div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://www.3M.com/AP-DRG
Include all codes defined in http://www.3M.com/APR-DRG

description.value: This value set defines three sets of DRGs, MS-DRGs (Medicare Severity Diagnosis Related Groups) AP-DRGs (All Patient Diagnosis Related Groups) and APR-DRGs (All Patient Refined Diagnosis Related Groups). MS-DRGs are owned by CMS; AP-DRGs and APR-DRGs are owned by 3M. Assignment of a DRG is defined by a particular set of patient attributes, which include principal diagnosis, specific secondary diagnoses, procedures, sex and discharge status. Identifying a DRG code requires a version.

copyright.value: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) maintain the MS-DRGs used throughout the US health care industry. Use of APR-DRGs require a license. Reference https://www.3m.com/3M/en_US/health-information-systems-us/drive-value-based-care/patient-classification-methodologies/apr-drgs/. As HL7 is working with the owning authorities to finalize the urls, the urls are subject to change.
